backend/main.mo: Defines types and storage for videos, categories, quizzes, settings, admin config, and user profiles with authorization and blob storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for documentation or build reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, authentication guards, theme provider, and global layout for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI for listing, adding, and deleting video categories with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/DashboardV: Admin form to edit dashboard visual settings and persist them via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/DonationLi: Admin form for editing and saving the Selar donation link.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomeConten: Dialog form for editing homepage hero text fields and saving them through updateHomePageText.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageVi: Form to configure homepage visuals including hero background, overlay, and optional hero image upload.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoUpload: Component for uploading, previewing, removing, and saving a site logo via settings update.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizEditor: Editor dialog for creating or updating quizzes, managing video selection, questions, answers, and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizzesMan: Displays quiz list with create, edit, and delete actions, integrating QuizEditor and deletion confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThemeSetti: Simple form allowing admins to change and save primary and secondary theme colors.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Displays a list of users with their details and allows admins to change user status via dropdown.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoEdito: Modal form for adding or editing videos, including uploading thumbnails and selecting categories.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideosMana: Lists all videos with edit and delete actions and manages opening the video editor or delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and updates query state accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to create a profile with name and optional email.
frontend/src/components/donations/PostQu: Displays a post-quiz modal encouraging users to donate, using a configurable external link.
frontend/src/components/donations/ShowSo: Button that opens the donation link if available.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeContent: Renders hero text for the home page and allows admins to open an editor to modify it.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo, navigation links, auth/admin options, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with theme setup, header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Fetches and displays top 5 leaderboard results with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/QuizTaki: Renders quiz questions, submits answers, shows score, and optionally opens donation modal.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/VideoQui: Loads quizzes for a video and lets users select and take a quiz.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Displays a video with YouTube embed parsing and shows quiz section for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides authentication state, user role (admin), and caller profile via backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and auth client state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating settings, videos, categories, and other backend data using an actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Applies theme colors from settings data to CSS variables and returns the active theme.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays the user's quiz history using fetched quiz results with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing videos, categories, quizzes, users, donation links, home content, and appearance settings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage using settings data, rendering hero visuals, categories, and video sections with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/utils/color.ts: Provides hex color validation, hex-to-RGB conversion, and a clamp utility.
frontend/src/utils/privacy.ts: Generates an anonymized, short user label based on an identifier.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors via CSS variables, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
